post.desc:
Raiko does have [**a spell card**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/List_of_Spell_Cards/Touhou_Project_3#:~:text=二鼓「怨霊アヤノツヅミ」 ) we know of with an onryō theme. The relevant gist of *Aya no Tsuzumi* (*The Damask Drum*) is that a drum made from damask silk cannot make a sound – the old gardener was tricked, killed himself, and became an onryō.

And **Sugawara no Michizane** is a really big name. He was a scholar and a politician, so you can guess that it's court intrigue (specifically the **Fujiwara** clan) that got him vengeful. Legend says that when he died, natural disasters struck. The imperial court posthumously restored his titles, reversed his exile, and even dedicated a shrine to him. Later on, he was deified to **Tenjin**, a very influential god even in modern days. People pray to him for good luck in exams.

By the way, when Michizane took his civil service examination, guess who examined him – **Miyako no Yoshika**.
